short_summary: Procurement for one Industrial Shredder Machine to demilitarize CTAT items
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W6369-22-X053 dated 10 November 2022, cancelled on 09 December 2022 at 2:00 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.
tags: Equipment, Free Trade Agreement, Security, Trade Agreement, contracts },
full_summary:
=================================================================
**Request for Proposal**
=================================================================
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the supply and delivery of one industrial shredder. The principal purpose of the shredder will be to demilitarize controlled technology access and transfer (CTAT) items, including CADPAT uniforms and various textiles, leathers, and rubbers.

**Notice of Amendment**
------------------------

This specification cancels and supersedes the previous request for proposal (RFP) number W6369-22-X053, dated November 10, 2022, which was cancelled on December 9, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Contractual Requirements**
-------------------------

The contractor must supply and deliver one industrial shredder, meeting the requirements detailed in the Statement of Requirement (SOR) attached to this solicitation document as an annex.

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

This contract includes a security requirement. It is DND’s intention to award a single contract for this requirement. Bidders are required to refer to the RFP for detailed information.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

The basis of selection shall be the compliant bidder that offers the lowest-cost compliant proposal.

**Documents**
-------------

The following documents may be submitted in either English or French:

- **RFP Document**: [insert link]
- **SOR Annex**: [insert link]
- **Amendment 1**: [insert link]
- **Amendment 2**: [insert link]

**Submission Information**
-------------------------

Submission deadline is February 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Documents may be submitted electronically through [insert link]. Incomplete or late submissions will not be considered.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There will be no set-aside for Aboriginal businesses.

**Enquiries**
-------------

For further information, please contact Orsetti Petrocelli, Rogelio at Rogelio.Orsettipetrocelli@forces.gc.ca or 613-715-0853. Representatives from potential offerors are invited to contact the contracting officer to schedule a meeting or request a debriefing.

**Notice of Expiration**
-------------------------

Please note that the notice and RFP documents differ in some respects. In case of discrepancy, the RFP document is the authoritative source. This notice remains the sole source of information regarding this procurement. In the event of a discrepancy between the notice and RFP, the RFP prev
